item.title: Hao 楊尚豪
item.description: About Me I’m currently in love with ☕ Java and 🍃 Spring ecosystem and everything around microservices architecture, 🐳 Docker and automation. Open Source Engagement I have contributed to the following open source projects: Spring Data Elasticsearch JHipster Side Projects JTracker - The GitLab Issue Management Platform Tools & Languages & Technologies Build As a build tool, I prefer 📦 Maven because it is the most popular build tool for Java projects.
